name: Serious Arena
description:
Enter the Arena and use your trusty Axe to slash through waves of monsters as you level up and collect powerful gear! This top down, hack and slash RPG puts you in an impossible to survive mission that starts off easy, and gets ridiculously hard as you progress. 

Features

  • Endless arena of increasing difficulty
  • Face off against monsters and angry Bosses as you progress round by round 
  • Customize your Loadout by choosing an Ultimate item to start with, leap forward arena rounds, and start with a higher level hero
  • Unlock more Loadout options by progressing further into the arena
  • Level your hero up to level 100 unlocking stat points along the way to enhance your hero
  • Over 55 pieces of Ultimate gear to find
  • Collect Item sets to harness unspeakable power!
  • 8 spells you can customize to increase damage, range, add effects and more
  • Break down gear you aren't using to Enchant your equipment 

Controls

  • Left click to move
  • Use 1-5 or right click to cast spells, Left click on an enemy to attack
  • (I) to open your Inventory, right click or click and drag to equip items
  • Hover over items to get a description of what they add to your character
  • Shift left click to break down items into magic
  • (P) to open your stat Points
  • (S) to open your Spellbook
  • Escape opens the menu, Gear in the top right of the menu opens Settings
  • Can adjust settings to show the simple stats or the advanced stats of an item as well as play the arena on quick speed.
